product_name: Amphipod HandPod SmartView Plus Phone Holster
long_description: The Amphipod HandPod SmartView Plus offers low-profile, clear touch access to your iPhone 5 or similar-size phone while you run. Comfortably worn on the inside of your palm or the back of your hand; multiposition thumb lock design dials in the perfect fit. Breathable, ultrasoft strap easily adjusts to fit most hand sizes; clear panel allows full access to your phone's touch screen. Route your headphone cord through any of the multiple cord ports. The Amphipod HandPod SmartView Plus features outer and inner pockets for cash, ID and headphone cord stash.
short_description: The Amphipod HandPod SmartView Plus offers low-profile, clear touch access to your iPhone 5 or similar-size phone while you run.
